mapper.select: select wcxmid,wcxmname,wcxmpwd,wcxmemail,wcxmalipay,wcxmpic,wcxqq,wcxwechat from wenchaxingmanager where wcxmname=#{wcxmname} and wcxmpwd=#{wcxmpwd}
mapper.insert:
select seq_wenchaxingmanager_wcxmid.nextval from dual
insert into wenchaxingmanager(wcxmid,wcxmname,wcxmpwd,wcxmemail,wcxmalipay,wcxmpic,wcxqq,wcxwechat) values(#{wcxmid},#{wcxmname},#{wcxmpwd},#{wcxmemail},#{wcxmalipay},#{wcxmpic},#{wcxqq},#{wcxwechat})
